labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Discord Canary 0.0.154 (Build 4053), macOS Sierra 10.12.6 (16G29) (iMac Retina 5K, 27-inch, Late 2017)
data.expected_result: You dont get a notification unless they mention you
data.steps_to_repro: - Set a server's notifications to All Messages in Notification Settings - Set a category to Mentions Only - Have someone sent a message in a channel in that category
